summary: Adds a small player home (cabin) near Riverwood. Balanced for new characters.
descriptionHtml:
Description
----------------
This mod adds a hunter cabin in the woods near Riverwood. Best experienced with new characters but existing ones can use it too.

Features
-------------
*Hunter stand with Shooting Range (That actually improves your skill & integrated workshop underneath)
*Hunting dog
*Fireplace that requires you to chop wood and gives you a nice effect.
*Workshop for all crafting/tempering needs (Outside: Workbench, Sharpeningstone, Anvil, Tanning rack, Chopping Block. Inside: Alchemy, Enchanting, Cooking)
*Storage
*2x Mannequins, 3 Display Cases, 2 Weapon Racks, 5 Weapon Plaques, 3 Book Cases
*Works with vanilla spouses
*Fully NavMesh-ed outside and inside
*Special Bow (not overpowered) and trophy display
*All custom clutter
*Alvor has saved some cash and bought a Smelter in Riverwood

Installation
----------------
Place the contents in your data folder and activate it before launching the game.

Key Location
--------------------
On the porch table next to the letter.
author: Breez3r
